document.full_text: a record-low one in four u.s. teenagers will land a summer job in the coming months as a result of a still-poor job market and lost federal funding, according to a report issued on monday.
document.title: teen joblessness may hit record in summer 2011
lines_and_colors: a record-low one in four u.s. teenagers will land a summer job in the coming months as a result of a still-poor job market and lost federal funding, according to a report issued on monday.
